summary_teim: Chuck Berry, James Brown, and Ray Charles are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
summary_ssm: Chuck Berry, James Brown, and Ray Charles are inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at its inaugural ceremony. Paul Shaffer and his band perform.
contents_teim: Jann Wenner introduces Ahmet Ertegun -- Ertegun introduces Keith Richards -- Richards inducts Berry -- Berry accepts award -- Wenner introduces Steve Winwood -- Winwood inducts Brown -- Brown accepts award -- Ertegun introduces Quincy Jones -- Jones inducts Charles -- Charles accepts award.

abstract_ssm:
This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986.  Jann Wenner introduces Ahmet Ertegun -- Ertegun inducts Chuck Berry, introduces Keith Richards -- Richards inducts Berry -- Berry accepts his award -- Wenner inducts James Brown, introduces 
This is footage from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony on January 23, 1986. Jann Wenner speech -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Keith Richards -- Keith Richards inducts Chuck Berry -- Jann Wenner introduces James Brown montage -- Jann Wenner introduces Steve Winwood -- Steve Winwood inducts James Brown -- James Brown speaks -- Ahmet Ertegun introduces Ray Charles -- Quincy Jones inducts Ray Charles -- Ray Charles acceptance speech
